name: Werewolf: The Last Warrior
summary: Werewolf: The Last Warrior, known in Japan as Super Werewolf Chronicle Warwolf (超人狼戦記WARWOLF（ウォーウルフ） Chō Jinrō Senki Wōurufu), is an Nintendo Entertainment System platform game about a werewolf that made its debut on November 16, 1990 in North America. It starred a werewolf character named "Warwolf".
info:
• 中文名: 超人狼战记

  • 别名: 超人狼戦記WARWOLF
